title: Sticky stir-fried beef

default: 1 garlic clove, crushed to a paste in a mortar and pestle

steps: Heat the sesame oil in a pan and gently fry the spring onions and garlic for 2-3 minutes to soften, then add the sweetcorn and beef strips. Fry for a further 3-4 minutes, or until the beef is cooked to your liking.
Stir in the ketchup, honey and sesame seeds until the beef is evenly coated, then pile onto a serving plate.
